text: Cercosaura anordosquama is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Brazil. ==References== Category:Cercosaura Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles described in 2018 Category:Taxa named by Marcelo José Sturaro Category:Taxa named by Miguel Trefaut Rodrigues Category:Taxa named by Guarino R. Colli Category:Taxa named by L. Lacey Knowles Category:Taxa named by Teresa C.S. Ávila-Pires
title: Cercosaura anordosquama
